extendedInfo.description: Do you want always stay update with the latest News on NFL??NFL News is the application that keeps you updated on National Football League, giving you the latest news on matches, divisions, trasnfers and teams.- News from major newspaper: Yahoo, Bleacher Report, Fox Sport, CBS Sport, Sport Illustrated, Usa Today, Sporting News, ESPN.- All the Teams from all the divisions!!!  -> AFC East: Buffalo Bills, Miami Dolphins, New England Patriots, New York Jets;  -> AFC North: Baltimore Ravens, Cincinnati Bengals, Cleveland Browns, Pittsburgh Steelers;  -> AFC South: Houston Texans, Indianapolis Colts, Jacksonville Jaguars, Tennessee Titans;  -> AFC West: Denver Broncos, Kansas City Chiefs, Oakland Raiders, San Diego Chargers;  -> NFC East: Dallas Cowboys, New York Giants, Philadelphia Eagles, Washington Redskins;  -> NFC North: Chicago Bears, Detroit Lions, Green Bay Packers, Minnesota Vikings;  -> NFC South: Atlanta Falcons, Carolina Panthers, New Orleans Saints, Tampa Bay Buccaneers;  -> NFC West: Arizona Cardinals, St. Louis Rams, San Francisco 49ers, Seattle Seahawks.A lot of new FEATURES: - Offline reading - Share favourite stories with your friends via email, tweet, Facebook or SMS - Save your favorite stories - Specific tablet layoutFollow us on Facebook (facebook.com/fflabs), Twitter (twitter.com/fflabs) or Google Plus (plus.google.com/u/0/104155336528065530025)!Disclaimer:We not affiliated with the NFL or any of the news providers shown within this application.Â© 2013 FF labs. All National Football League trademarks and copyrights used here are the property of the applicable NFL entity.All rights reserved.

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: This app is really really good and believe me I have tried all of the NFL news apps. This is the best one I found and it is the keeper. It just does what it is supposed to. I could not ask for anything more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Is good.
reviews.comment: No news about the Bengals is good new.

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: It would get five stars but whenever I get news from CBS sports it like seven, eight months old other than that very goo app
reviews.author: kevin boyd

reviews.title: False advertising
reviews.comment: Said it would have news on the Bengals ...lied :/
